overview: In a large kitchen with light brown cabinets and a work island topped with black marble and a glass vase of long green stems with white flowers, Pablo Torres (blue sweatshirt with black arms, close-cut dark hair, tattoos on upper right arm) kneels and sucks Antonio York (greenish t-shirt, hairy torso, floppy black hair); Antonio kneels and sucks Pablo; Antonio tops Pablo from behind standing as Pablo leans against the island.
title: Dads Doin' It 1
